<Conversation> : Late evening (around 7.30 pm) after shopping in the up market  South Extn locality in Delhi, I was trying to look for an auto to go back home. As the traffic was at its peak, I could not get any so I started walking towards the flyover in the hope that I would get one at the T point. This patch is a little deserted but has a lot of traffic. Mysteriously a lot of passing vehicles started to slow down near me as if asking for directions. After 2 vehicles I realized that most of these vehicles were single men driving big cars. These well educated men in big cars, on seeing a woman walking on the road alone at 7.30 could only think of two things  quotShe is a hookerquot...or she is alone therefore quotavailablequot. Felt sick and so vulnerable!<|eot_id|>
